Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.production

Class ConcreteProductionCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.production.ProductionCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.production.ConcreteProductionCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Card, Buyable
public class ConcreteProductionCard
extends ProductionCard
implements Card
The ConcreteProductionCard is a Card that can be puchased from the grid, when it's the player's turn. It costs a determined amount of Resourced, indicated by cost, and it's objective is to help the player produce more Resourced and earn more victory points.

Every Production card has a color and a level, which is the criteria used to divide the cards into the smaller 4-card decks, for each color and level. If a player wishes to purchase a ProductionCard of a level higher than 1, they must already own the Card of the previous level, while the new one needs to be placed on top.

Once a player owns at least one ProductionCard, they can use them to convert requiredResources to production, which includes Faith Points, of course the conversion gets better the higher the level of the card is.

It's also important to know that if a player reaches 7 owned ProductionCards, the game ends.
